author: julianfoad
msg: * STATUS: Propose r30162 for back-port and add pburba's vote from IRC.

author: glasser
msg: vtable-ify svn_cache, calling the current implementation an
New, mostly taken from cache.c.  Various adjustments, notably:
(svn_cache_get, svn_cache_set, svn_cache_iter): Just call the vtable

author: julianfoad
msg: Fix a bug in which Subversion could crash or mergeinfo could get set to
random values when using "svn merge --ignore-ancestry" on a single file.
See the thread starting at this message for more information:
Subject: Re-merge a change from own history - corrupts svn:mergeinfo
(mergeinfo_behavior): Don't record mergeinfo when we are ignoring ancestry.
to *not* expect mergeinfo changes when using --ignore-ancestry.
